entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
